author:
Tim Booth                                                    
                            AP
title: Most stadium work around U.S. continues, including St. Louis MLS project
description: Work has stopped in some locations, while construction has continued in others under strict guidelines.
content:
SEATTLE Workers are still showing up in Inglewood, California, Las Vegas, Seattle and Columbus, Ohio, and making progress on stadium and arena projects.
At Belmont Park on Long Island, and in Austin, Texas, the work has mostly come to a halt.
And in St. Lou… [+5403 chars]
